email_content:
Subject: Re: Invitation to Share Your Journey with Vital Voices  

Dear Mr. Thompson,

Thank you for reaching out and for the kind words about my advocacy work. I’m honored by the invitation to contribute to Vital Voices and would be delighted to share my story in a way that best serves your readers.

I’m flexible on format and can offer two options:

1. Interview  
   • Length: ~30 minutes via Zoom or phone  
   • Proposed slots (EST):  
     – Thu Mar 3, 10:00 AM  
     – Fri Mar 4, 2:00 PM  
     – Mon Mar 7, 11:00 AM  
   • I can provide a short bio and headshot in advance, and can review the final transcript for factual accuracy if helpful.

2. Guest article  
   • Working title: “Living Loudly: Lessons From My HIV Journey”  
   • Length: ~1,200 words delivered within two weeks of confirmation  
   • Outline:  
     – Early testing and diagnosis  
     – Confronting external and internalized stigma  
     – Embracing treatment & support systems  
     – A call to action for allies and policymakers  

Let me know which option fits your editorial calendar, or if you’d prefer a hybrid approach. Either way, I’m excited about the opportunity to help educate, reduce stigma, and empower others through Vital Voices.

Warm regards,

Jane Doe  
(Pronouns: she/her)  
Phone: XXX-XXX-XXXX
